title: Graded and raw T206s for sale

posts.post_title: Graded and raw T206s for sale
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards for sale:

T206 Mordecai Brown - Chicago on Shirt - SC 460 - SGC 50 - $225
T206 Al Burch - Fielding - American Beauty 350 no frame - SGC 30 - $SOLD
T206 Hal Chase - Dark Cap - P350 - SGC 40 - $65
T206 Lou Criger - P150 - Raw (evidence of trimming) - $25
T206 Solly Hofman - P350 - Raw (evidence of trimming) - $25
T206 Harry Howell - Portrait - P350 - SGC 45 - $45
T206 Miller Huggins - Hands at Mouth - SC350 - Raw (former PSA 4) - $160
T206 Ed Willetts - P350 - Raw (evidence of trimming) - $25

Prices include shipping.  Scans available upon request.

Marty
